channel.title: CVE Feed for Recurly -- recurly ruby gem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Recurly -- recurly ruby gem

item.title: CVE-2017-0905|2024-08-05T13:25:17.133Z -- recurly -- recurly%20ruby%20gem
item.description: The Recurly Client Ruby Library before 2.0.13, 2.1.11, 2.2.5, 2.3.10, 2.4.11, 2.5.4, 2.6.3, 2.7.8, 2.8.2, 2.9.2, 2.10.4, 2.11.3 is vulnerable to a Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability in the "Resource#find" method that could result in compromise of API keys or other critical resources.
